text: On the “big project” end of the scale, Python is easy to read: no eyeburn from nested curly braces or parens, and fewer levels of nesting thanks to comprehensions, maps, and other features.

text:
sure, but iterators enable some very cool things like:
```let b =
    a
        .filter(|num| num % 2 === 0)
        .map(|num| num * num)
        .fold(|a, b| a + b, 0);```

elements.text: sure, but iterators enable some very cool things like:
